info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 12 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Cedar Creek At Cedarburg affecting Ozaukee County.
Menomonee River At Menomonee Falls affecting Waukesha County.
Fox River Lower At Waukesha affecting Waukesha County.
Milwaukee River At Milwaukee affecting Milwaukee County.
Milwaukee River Near Cedarburg affecting Ozaukee County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Milwaukee River at Milwaukee.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Floodwaters affect property along Port Washington Road including the Hilton Hotel.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 PM CDT Tuesday was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.0 feet on 03/15/1946. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 445 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
